title: Block Story 8.0.4
description:
This is: Block Story 8.0.4

The game's been updated! Some new stuff added... and I hear the interface's been cleaned up (some people ain't liking that, though). Either way, check the changelog... and check the game out if it seems even remotely interesting. JUST INSTALL IT AND GO!!

Oh, also... seems the FAS 'group' has 'released' the game. Only issue with that is they'd supposedly released v8.0.5.... and last I checked there ain't no 8.0.5 version out yet... so they're off on that mess.
---------------------------------------------

CHANGELOG:

V 8.0.4
* Fixed crafting problem
V 8.0.3
* High res textures are back (we heard you loud and clear)
V 8.0.2
* Don't require facebook
v 8.0.1
* Fixed Korean font
* Fixed radar
v 8.0
* Improved controls (no more digging while looking around)
* Improved performance
* Redesigned user friendly interface
* Korean translation
* Miner helmet
* Decorative pipes
* Facebook integration
* Fixed issue with losing items
* Added description for all items
* Improved memory usage



Description:
Block Story combines the popular block mining with exciting and addictive role playing.

Features:
* Infinite world even up and down
* 25 Quests, that give you objectives and hours of fun
* Leveling up, and skill points to improve your character
* Beautiful terrain generation with Hell, biomes, floating islands, forgotten sky, underground world and coral reefs.
* Torches you can make and carry to light your way through caves
* Equipment you can wear like "My Precious" (a powerful ring), and flippers (to swim faster)
* Crafting, combine resources to create tools and weapons
* Many weapons, like swords, magic, shields, guns, bow and arrow
* 88 realistic mobs, from lizards to dragons, from clownfish to giant sharks.
* Beautiful graphics, with colored lights, epic night sky, and bumped terrain
* Vehicles: car, boat, diver suit, jetpack
* Very fast, it works well even in older computers.



--------------------------------------
*Absolutely 100% clean and working!*
*My upload ain't the best, but I'll seed this forever!*
*BUY the games you reallllly dig!!!
